meanings.meaning_en_US: To be able to do something.

examples.sentence: I [can] swim very well.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我能游泳非常好。

examples.sentence: Can you help me with this?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能幫我這個嗎？

examples.sentence: They [can] finish the project on time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們能按時完成這個項目。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A visual representation of something, typically created by a camera or artist.

examples.sentence: She framed the [picture] of her family.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她把全家福的圖片裝裱起來。

examples.sentence: This [picture] captures the moment perfectly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這張圖片完美地捕捉了那一刻。

examples.sentence: He drew a [picture] of his dog.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他畫了牠的狗的圖片。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A tube through which a liquid or gas can flow.

examples.sentence: The water flows through the [pipe].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 水通過管子流動。

examples.sentence: He fixed the broken [pipe] in the bathroom.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他修理了浴室裡壞掉的管子。

examples.sentence: They installed a new [pipe] for the heating system.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們安裝了一根新的管子進行暖氣系統。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Costing a lot of money.

examples.sentence: This watch is really [expensive].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個手錶真的很昂貴

examples.sentence: They need to budget for [expensive] items.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們需要預算昂貴的項目

examples.sentence: Hiring a lawyer can be [expensive].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 聘請律師可能很昂貴

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who teaches, especially in a school.

examples.sentence: My favorite [teacher] always makes learning fun.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我最喜歡的老師總是讓學習變得愉快。

examples.sentence: The [teacher] assigned homework for the week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 老師為這週布置了作業。

examples.sentence: A good [teacher] inspires their students.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 好老師能激勵他們的學生。

meanings.meaning_en_US: the father of one's father or mother.

examples.sentence: My [grandfather] taught me how to fish.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我的祖父教我如何釣魚。

examples.sentence: He visits his [grandfather] every summer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他每年夏天都會拜訪他的外公。

examples.sentence: I have many stories from my [grandfather].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我有很多來自祖父的故事。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A strip of leather or other material worn around the waist to support or hold clothing in place.

examples.sentence: He wore a black [belt] with his suit.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他穿著西裝搭配一條黑色腰帶。

examples.sentence: She tightened her [belt] after eating a large meal.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在吃了一頓大餐後緊了緊腰帶。

examples.sentence: The [belt] was adorned with beautiful designs.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 腰帶上裝飾著美麗的圖案。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A piece of furniture with a flat top and one or more legs.

examples.sentence: Please put the book on the [table].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請把書放在桌子上。

examples.sentence: We need a bigger [table] for dinner.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要一張更大的桌子來吃晚餐。

examples.sentence: The meeting will be held around the [table].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 會議將在桌子周圍舉行。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Moving in a constant direction on (a path or any surface).

examples.sentence: We walked [along] the riverbank.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們沿著河岸散步

examples.sentence: The path runs [along] the edge of the forest.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這條小路沿著森林的邊緣延伸

examples.sentence: The children played [along] the beach.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 孩子們在沙灘上玩耍

meanings.meaning_en_US: The abstract science of number, quantity, and space.

examples.sentence: He studies [mathematics] at the university.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在大學學習數學

examples.sentence: The teacher explained [mathematics] in a simple way.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 老師用簡單的方式解釋數學

examples.sentence: Advanced [mathematics] can be challenging.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 高級數學可能很有挑戰性

meanings.meaning_en_US: To write or name the letters that form a word in correct sequence.

examples.sentence: Can you [spell] your name for me?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能為我拼出你的名字嗎？

examples.sentence: He struggled to [spell] difficult words correctly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在正確拼寫困難單詞方面遇到了困難。

examples.sentence: In class, they will practice how to [spell] new vocabulary.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在課堂上，他們將練習如何拼寫新單詞彙。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The action or process of paying someone or something.

examples.sentence: The [payment] is due at the end of the month.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 付款在月底到期。

examples.sentence: She made a [payment] for her new car.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她為她的新車付款。

examples.sentence: Online [payment] is becoming more popular.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在線付款越來越受歡迎。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The ordinal number corresponding to the number fifty.

examples.sentence: They celebrate their [fiftieth] wedding anniversary.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們慶祝了第五十個結婚紀念日。

examples.sentence: The competition had its [fiftieth] edition this year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這場競賽今年迎來了第五十屆。

examples.sentence: She is in her [fiftieth] year of life.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她現在是五十歲。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A tapering orange root eaten as a vegetable.

examples.sentence: She loves eating a crunchy [carrot] with her salad.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡在沙拉中搭配脆脆的胡蘿蔔

examples.sentence: Rabbits are often associated with [carrots].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 兔子通常和胡蘿蔔有關

examples.sentence: He added [carrots] to the soup for flavor.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在湯裡加入胡蘿蔔以增添風味

meanings.meaning_en_US: Most important; principal.

examples.sentence: This is the [main] entrance to the building.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是建築物的主要入口。

examples.sentence: The [main] reason for the meeting is to discuss the budget.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 會議的主要原因是討論預算。

examples.sentence: We will focus on our [main] project this quarter.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們將集中精力在這個季度的主要項目。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The edge of the mouth, used in speech and eating.

examples.sentence: She painted her [lip] with red lipstick.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她用紅色口紅給嘴唇上色。

examples.sentence: He smiled, revealing his [lips].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他微笑時露出了嘴唇。

examples.sentence: The [lip] of the cup is chipped.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 杯子的嘴唇部分有缺口。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A number of people or things that are located, gathered, or classed together.

examples.sentence: The [group] discussed various topics.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 小組討論了各種主題。

examples.sentence: She joined a study [group].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她加入了一個學習小組。

examples.sentence: They formed a [group] to help the community.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們成立了一個小組來幫助社區。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The number equivalent to the sum of six tens; one more than fifty-nine.

examples.sentence: There are [sixty] seconds in a minute.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每分鐘有六十秒

examples.sentence: He is [sixty] years old.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他六十歲

examples.sentence: The event starts at [sixty] past noon.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 活動在中午六十分鐘後開始

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used before the first of two (or occasionally more) alternatives that are being specified.

examples.sentence: You can choose [either] cake or ice cream.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以選擇[任一]蛋糕或冰淇淋。

examples.sentence: I will [either] call you or text you.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我將[任一]打電話給你或發短信給你。

examples.sentence: It's [either] this or that.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是[任一]這個或那個。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Relating to a nation; common to or characteristic of a whole nation.

examples.sentence: This is a [national] holiday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是一個國定假日

examples.sentence: The [national] anthem was played at the event.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在活動上播放了國歌

examples.sentence: He is a [national] hero.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是一位國家英雄
